pkgmetadata.longdescription: Supplemental U.S. 2000 Census Tract Boundaries for 20 Eastern States, District and Territory without Seer Registries for 'SeerMapper' // Provides supplemental 2000 census tract boundaries for the 20 states, district and territory without Seer Registries that are east of the Mississippi river for use with the 'SeerMapper' package. The data contained in this package is derived from U.S. Census data and is in the public domain.
